span.p: VMAX STUDIO is an intuitive visualization tool that enables you to:

ul.li: Visualize the VMAX 250F and VMAX 950F array configurations by following a few-step Configuration Wizard.
Save array configurations internally in the VMAX Studio format - Saved configurations are displayed as icons at the bottom in the filtering pane.
Save objects such as configurations or individual components in the PNG graphics file format.
Display configurations exported from Vmax Sizer via XML.
Explore array configurations and hardware components by using the context-sensitive help and the drill-down component views.

span.p: Import Sizer XML - Click to import Sizer XML. Available only for desktop version of the application .
Save configuration - Click to save a newly created configuration. Saved configurations are displayed in the filtering pane as icons with unique configuration IDs.
Copy to Clipboard - Click to copy the contents of the display pane to Clipboard.
Export as image - Click to save the contents of the display pane to a *.PNG file.
Highlight - Click to highlight the main power components in the array configuration view.
Change view - Click to switch view (front, rear, top).
Toggle property panels - Show or hide property information in/from the display pane.
Configuration Wizard - Click to configure a new VMAX All Flash array.
